sense.def:
Each thing or person in a group
pomeni vsaka stvar ali oseba v skupini kot posamezna enota ali posameznik.

seg.quote: Each county is subdivided into several districts.
There were peaches and pears. I opened two tins of each.

sense.def:
Z besedo
each
poudarimo, da govorimo o vsaki posamezni stvari ali osebi v skupini.

Izraz
each other
uporabimo, kadar rečemo, da vsak član skupine nekaj naredi drugim članom.

seg.quote: She and John looked at each other.
